ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So it was! And We bequeathed them to the tribe of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Thus it was; and We made the children of Israel possess them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This happened with them; (but on the other hand), We enabled the Children of Israel to inherit those bounties.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So it was; and We made the Descendants of Israel its inheritors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Thus and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Even so. And We gave them as a heritage to the children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: even so, and We bequeathed them upon the Children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus (were those things taken from them) and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and We made the Children of Israel inheritors of these bounties.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Even so. And We caused the Children of Isra'il to inherit them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So it was; and We bequeathed them to the Children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus it was, but We made the Children of Israel inheritors of such things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Thus [We turned them (Pharaoh's people) out] and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As such we gave it to the Children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So it was. And We made the Children of Israel inherit them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Thus. And We caused to inherit it the Children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:59] So [it was], that is, Our expulsion [of them] was as We have described, and We made the Children of Israel to inherit these, after drowning Pharaoh and his folk.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus) I do with the ones who disobey Me, (and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit them) to inherit Egypt after their destruction.
